sentences.english: Should he or she elect to wear a belly button ring or a barbell?
sentences.chinese: 她或者他，選擇佩戴肚臍環還是肚臍鈴？

sentences.english: At this time, followed by a burst of bell, and everyone bolted back to the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 這時，緊隨一陣上課鈴，大家又狂奔回教室。

sentences.english: Get up with adjustments bell, lights-out bell time function.
sentences.chinese: 具有調整起牀鈴，熄燈鈴時間的功能。

sentences.english: Get up with adjustments bell, lights-out bell time function.
sentences.chinese: 具有調整起牀鈴，熄燈鈴時間的功能。

sentences.english: Whenever he has registered letters for us, he will ring the doorbell.
sentences.chinese: 如果有掛號信要送給我們，他就會在門口按一下鈴。

sentences.english: The two fighters squared away when the bell rang.
sentences.chinese: 鈴一響那兩個拳擊手就擺好迎擊架勢。

sentences.english: Bending over the handlebars, I pedaled furiously, ringing my bell as I passed.
sentences.chinese: 俯在車把上，我瘋狂的蹬腳板，打着鈴超過了他們。

sentences.english: Tinker Bell is very jealous of Wendy.
